column4: i know i can answer this question experimentally, and i intend to... but is it possible that the windows est battery life on my laptop is 2h while linux (xubuntu) est battery life is 5h... could that be correct?
estimation times i have found to be often very very wrong in both os's :)
well the rate that the % drops is far slower in linux... as i said... i'm going to test this experimentally, but that's an enormous difference
i was able to throttle down my linux laptop's cpu lower in linux, then i could in windows.  that  gave a huge extimated time.
